attributes.action: Small Viable Business Covid Support for 12 months (non hospitality trades)
attributes.additional_details:
small Ltd companies employing less than 10 people not in the hospitality sector are suffering more than any other business.  we are an estate agent that has been successfully trading for 2 years and extremely viable.  Rishi Sunak wants to help us, so please give him the support he needs in order for us to get this wonderful country back on its feet.
We will end up paying it back so help us now when we need it please.
attributes.background:
Financial support extended within the part time rules - govt to cover 16 hours employers to cover 24 hrs - this is only asking for 1 extra days help so that we can survive this period

Extend the bounce back loans immediately
